name: TG File Share/Sharing Bot
description: file sharing bot store posts and it can access by special links

ADMINS.description: Enter admins no need to add owner id, add with no commas and no hyphens

TG_BOT_TOKEN.description: Your Bot token, Get it from @Botfather

APP_ID.description: your app id, take it from my.telegram.org

API_HASH.description: your api hash, take it from my.telegram.org

CHANNEL_ID.description: make a channel (database channel), then make the bot as admin in channel, and it's put channel id

TIME.description: Enter the time after which message gets deleted

FORCE_SUB_CHANNEL.description: Enter your channel id for forcesub 1

FORCE_SUB_CHANNEL2.description: Enter your channel id for forcesub 2

BOT_STATS_TEXT.description: Enter your custom bot stat text with fillings

USER_REPLY_TEXT.description: Enter user reply text when they interact with bot
USER_REPLY_TEXT.value: ‚ùåDon't send me messages directly I'm only File Share bot!

START_MSG.description: Enter your bot start message when user interact for the first time.
START_MSG.value:
Hello {first}

I can store private files in Specified Channel and other users can access it from special link.

USE_SHORTLINK.description: Enter True for enabling this feature

FORCE_MSG.description: Force message for joining the channel

PROTECT_CONTENT.description: Enter True if need to stop forwarding from bot

DISABLE_CHANNEL_BUTTON.description: Enter False if need to enable buttons in database channel
